attributes.action: stop over seas aid to  countries that turn a blind eye  to  rape , stoning and hanging of women
attributes.additional_details: Third world countries cultures are  increasing treating women as   inferior, and  men are using  terror and  hatred to  punish them for  transgresions that men are not punished for. No women should be raped, hung, stoned, or tortured because she is a woman. India, Pakistan  and other  countries are  increasingly anti women. We have to stop  giving overseas aid to these countries,as  in doing so we condone these attacks on women as their governments fail to  outlaw and act to stop these barbaric acts.
